title: Google\Cloud\StorageTransfer\V1\TransferOptions
name: TransferOptions
description:
TransferOptions define the actions to be performed on objects in a transfer.

Generated from protobuf message google.storagetransfer.v1.TransferOptions

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.overwrite_objects_already_existing_in_sink
params.description: When to overwrite objects that already exist in the sink. The default is that only objects that are different from the source are ovewritten. If true, all objects in the sink whose name matches an object in the source will be overwritten with the source object.

params.name: data.delete_objects_unique_in_sink
params.description: Whether objects that exist only in the sink should be deleted. Note: This option and [delete_objects_from_source_after_transfer] [google.storagetransfer.v1.TransferOptions.delete_objects_from_source_after_transfer] are mutually exclusive.

params.name: data.delete_objects_from_source_after_transfer
params.description: Whether objects should be deleted from the source after they are transferred to the sink. Note: This option and [delete_objects_unique_in_sink] [google.storagetransfer.v1.TransferOptions.delete_objects_unique_in_sink] are mutually exclusive.

methods.name: getOverwriteObjectsAlreadyExistingInSink
methods.description:
When to overwrite objects that already exist in the sink. The default is that only objects that are different from the source are ovewritten. If true, all objects in the sink whose name matches an object in the source will be overwritten with the source object.

Generated from protobuf field bool overwrite_objects_already_existing_in_sink = 1;

methods.description:

params.name: var
params.description: When to overwrite objects that already exist in the sink. The default is that only objects that are different from the source are ovewritten. If true, all objects in the sink whose name matches an object in the source will be overwritten with the source object.

methods.name: getDeleteObjectsUniqueInSink

Whether objects that exist only in the sink should be deleted.

Note: This option and [delete_objects_from_source_after_transfer] [google.storagetransfer.v1.TransferOptions.delete_objects_from_source_after_transfer] are mutually exclusive.

Generated from protobuf field bool delete_objects_unique_in_sink = 2;

methods.description:
Whether objects that exist only in the sink should be deleted.

Note: This option and [delete_objects_from_source_after_transfer] [google.storagetransfer.v1.TransferOptions.delete_objects_from_source_after_transfer] are mutually exclusive.

Generated from protobuf field bool delete_objects_unique_in_sink = 2;

Note: This option and [delete_objects_from_source_after_transfer] [google.storagetransfer.v1.TransferOptions.delete_objects_from_source_after_transfer] are mutually exclusive.

methods.description:

Note: This option and [delete_objects_unique_in_sink] [google.storagetransfer.v1.TransferOptions.delete_objects_unique_in_sink] are mutually exclusive.
